name: Account Owner Traversal
description: Retrieve Account owner's name and email for contact information and assignment tracking

name: Account Parent Traversal
description: Access parent Account information for hierarchical account structures and corporate relationships

name: Contact Account Traversal
description: Retrieve Contact's associated Account name and industry for context in customer communications

name: Contact Owner Traversal
description: Get Contact owner's name for assignment tracking and territory management

name: Contact ReportsTo Traversal
description: Access Contact's manager information for organizational hierarchy and approval chains

name: Opportunity Account Traversal
description: Retrieve Opportunity's Account details including revenue for deal qualification and forecasting

name: Opportunity Owner Traversal
description: Get Opportunity owner's contact information for sales team coordination and commission tracking

name: Opportunity Primary Contact Traversal
description: Access primary Contact information for deal stakeholder identification and communication

name: Opportunity Campaign Traversal
description: Link Opportunity to source Campaign for marketing ROI analysis and lead source tracking

name: OpportunityContactRole Contact Traversal
description: Retrieve detailed Contact information from OpportunityContactRole for stakeholder engagement

name: OpportunityContactRole Opportunity Traversal
description: Access Opportunity details from OpportunityContactRole for deal context in multi-stakeholder analysis

name: Task WhoId Contact Traversal
description: Retrieve Contact name from Task's WhoId field (polymorphic - Contact or Lead) for activity tracking

name: Task WhatId Account Traversal
description: Access Account name from Task's WhatId field (polymorphic) for account-level activity reporting

name: Task Owner Traversal
description: Get Task owner's name for workload distribution and productivity tracking

name: Event WhoId Contact Traversal
description: Retrieve Contact details from Event's WhoId field for meeting participant identification

name: Event WhatId Account Traversal
description: Access Account name from Event's WhatId field for account-level calendar activity tracking

name: Event Owner Traversal
description: Get Event owner's name for calendar management and meeting organizer identification

name: Case Contact Traversal
description: Retrieve Case Contact information for customer support communication and case routing

name: Case Account Traversal
description: Access Case Account name for enterprise support tracking and SLA management

name: Lead Owner Traversal
description: Get Lead owner's name for lead assignment tracking and conversion rate analysis by rep
